description: Creates or updates the specified virtual network rule. During update, the virtual network rule with the specified name will be replaced with this new virtual network rule.

properties.description: The virtual network rule properties to use when creating a new virtual network rule.

subscription_id.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the Azure resource group.

account_name.description: The name of the Data Lake Store account.

virtual_network_rule_name.description: The name of the virtual network rule to create or update.

parameters.description: Parameters supplied to create or update the virtual network rule.
